About

Hi there! My name is Daniel McCormick.

I’m a computer engineering student at UWaterloo. I’m interested in cooking, reading, writing and sometimes programming

You can find my github here, but I’d presume if you’ve come to this page you already know that. While I know a variety of languages (including VHDL, Asm, C, Python, and Javscript), I tend to commit a lot of C++. I attribute this to my interest in lightweight abstractions and large templating error messages.

You can additionally find my goodreads here, but I don’t maintain it very well. If you have any good book reccomendations, please do let me know.

Resume TBD.
